ontA.label: Cohort (Metadata)
ontA.comment: An ontological representation of the Cohort parameters. The ontology has been automatically generated based on the uploaded Excel Document with Cohort Metadata (extracted on Date: 2019-07-08). This document has been also automatically generated based on the data recorded about 297 patients. For each patient, there are 82 Fields (Parameters aka Properties), the value of which often come from one out of 77 different controlled Set of Terms. Metadata extracted have been revised by technical experts (in close collaboration with clinical experts).
ontA.creator: Institute of Communications and Computer Systems of National Technical University of Athens - ICCS/NTUA

ontB.label: HarmonicSS - Reference Model and Vocabularies
ontB.comment:
This ontology specifies the parameters of particular interest for the diagnosis, control and/or treatment of patients associated with the primary Sjogren Syndrome (pSS). 

The design of the ontology was driven by the documents with the minimum and maximum pSS parameters (D.4.1 revised) prepared by the Clinical Partners participating in the HarmonicSS project.

arguments.argname: UNL and DNL Unit of Measurement

directTransformation.description: Provides the appropriate Term for the specific Lab Test and the Outcome Assessment based on the Value of the given Field, the parameters provided (i.e., corresponding Reference Model) and Mapping Rules specified. Also, provided that the UNL and DNL specified (including Unit of Measurement), the Normal Range of Values will be also recorded.

jsonarray.simcomments: There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "Anti-beta 2 glycoprotein IgG" and "Anti-beta 2 glycoprotein IgG" consist of the same sequence of characters.
There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "Anti-beta 2 glycoprotein IgM" and "Anti-beta 2 glycoprotein IgM" consist of the same sequence of characters.
There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "Anti-dsDNA" and "Anti-dsDNA" consist of the same sequence of characters.
There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "Anti-gastric mucosa" and "Anti-gastric mucosa" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Anti-mitochondrial (any quantitative test)" and "Anti-mitochondrial (any quantitative test)" consist of the same sequence of characters.
There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "Anti-mitochondrial M2" and "Anti-mitochondrial M2" consist of the same sequence of characters.
There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "Anti-Smooth Muscle Antibody" and "Anti-Smooth Muscle Antibody" consist of the same sequence of characters.
The concepts have the same name. Strings "Coombs test direct" and "Coombs test direct" consist of the same sequence of characters.
There is another term with the same name (synonym). Strings "Lupus Anticoagulant" and "Lupus Anticoagulant" consist of the same sequence of characters.
